diagnosis: Phone display or power supply issue
fixes: Check charging cable and adapter for damage
Force restart the device (hold power + volume down)
Check for software updates in settings
Test in safe mode to rule out third-party apps
Inspect for physical damage to screen or ports
Try a different charger and cable
Clean charging port with compressed air

diagnosis: Laptop performance or cooling system issue
fixes: Check power adapter connection and battery indicator
Clean air vents and fans to prevent overheating
Run disk cleanup and defragmentation utilities
Update graphics and chipset drivers
Scan for malware and viruses
Check Task Manager for resource-heavy processes
Consider adding more RAM if consistently slow
Check if refrigerator is plugged in and outlet has power
Clean condenser coils at the back (unplug first)
Ensure thermostat is set correctly (37-40°F for fridge, 0°F for freezer)
Check for blocked air vents inside the unit
Listen for compressor sounds - silence may indicate motor failure
Inspect door seals for gaps or damage
Defrost if ice buildup is excessive

diagnosis: Washing machine drainage or balance issue
fixes: Check drain hose for kinks, clogs, or blockages
Clean the filter/lint trap (usually behind small panel)
Ensure machine is level - adjust feet if necessary
Check water supply valves are fully open
Inspect for error codes on digital display
Redistribute laundry for balanced load
Check pump for obstructions

diagnosis: Microwave heating element or power supply problem
fixes: Check power cord and outlet with another device
Ensure door closes completely and safety latch engages
Test with a cup of water for 1 minute (should get warm)
Listen for unusual humming or clicking noises
Check interior for food splatter causing arcing
Inspect turntable motor and roller guide
Test keypad with different buttons

diagnosis: Air conditioner cooling or airflow problem
fixes: Check thermostat settings and replace batteries if needed
Clean or replace air filters (clogged filters reduce airflow)
Ensure outdoor unit is clear of leaves and debris
Listen for unusual compressor or fan motor noises
Check for ice buildup on evaporator coils
Inspect ductwork for leaks or obstructions
Verify circuit breaker hasn't tripped
